column5: This is a bright airy duplex right near the beach! A short walk also takes you to the Pleasure Pier, Hotel Galvez, restaurants, nightlife, and lots of family-friendly activities. My place is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups. There are two units available, this is a listing for the downstairs, which contains a kids yellow submarine themed bunk room. The unit has 4 twin beds, and 2 queen size beds.
column8: The Yellow Submarine House - Walk to Seawall!!
